Title: The Choice
Plot: Carrie is faced with a pivotal decision, while Brody meets with Faber to contemplate the future of the family. Meanwhile, Saul undertakes a secret assignment; and Quinn has a decision to make that may prove to be a game-changer.
GuestStars: Navid Negahban, Laura Avnaim, John Cariani, Gordon Dillard Jr., TJ Hassan, Edelen McWilliams
